name: Adapt New Strategies
objective: Own 2 faction technologies. "Valefar Assimilator" technologies do not count toward this objective.
objective2: Own 5 technologies owned by no other player.

name: Allow Others A Voice
objective: After the second agenda of the agenda phase is resolved, have more influence on readied planets than any other player.
objective2: After the second agenda of the agenda phase is resolved, have more influence on readied planets than all other players combined.

name: Amass Forces
objective: Have at least 10 units in each of 4 systems.
objective2: Have at least 10 units in each of 7 systems.

name: Ambush Exhausted Fleet
objective: As the active player, win a space combat in a system that contains 1 of your opponents command tokens.
objective2: Have ships in each of 6 systems that contain another player's command token.

name: Assemble a Swarm
objective: Have 20 fighters on the game board.
objective2: Have 45 fighters on the game board.

name: Balance Imperial Interests
objective: Control planets that have a combined value of at least 8 resources and at least 8 influence.
objective2: Control planets that have a combined value of at least 20 resources and at least 20 influence.

name: Battle Before the Unknown
objective: Win a combat in a system that contains a wormhole.
objective2: Have a ship in each of 6 systems that contain a wormhole.

name: Become a Martyr
objective: Lose control of a planet in a home system.
objective2: Control no planets in your home system.

name: Become the Gatekeeper
objective: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole.
objective2: Have 3 or more ships in each of 2 different systems that contain an alpha wormhole and 3 or more ships in each of 2 different systems that contain a beta wormhole.

name: Betray a Friend
objective: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player whose promissory note your have in your play area.

name: Brave Hazards
objective: Control a hazardous planet adjacent to another player's home system.
objective2: Control a hazardous planet in each of 2 systems adjacent to other players' home systems.

name: Brave the Void
objective: Win a combat in an anomaly.
objective2: Have a ship in each of 6 systems with an anomaly.

name: Broaden Strategies
objective: Have at least 15 units with at least 1 unit ability on the game board.
objective2: Have 25 units on the game board with at least 1 unit ability.

name: Build Transport Network
objective: Have 1 carrier in each of 4 systems.
objective2: Have a unit with capacity in each of 11 systems.

name: Centralize Forces
objective: Have at least 30 units in a system.
objective2: Have at least 60 units in a system.

name: Colonize Distant Stars
objective: Control a planet in each of 3 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.
objective2: Control a planet in each of 6 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Come. See. Conquer.
objective: Win more than 1 ground combat in a system during the same tactical action.
objective2: Control 5 planets adjacent to other players' home systems.

name: Control the Region
objective: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.
objective2: Have 1 or more ships in 12 systems.

name: Create Legendary Infrastructure
objective: Have at least 2 structures on legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or other player's home system planets.
objective2: Have at least 4 structures on legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or other player's home system planets.

name: Cripple Industry
objective: Destroy another player's space dock.
objective2: Destroy another player's last space dock.

name: Cut Supply Lines
objective: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.
objective2: Have 1 or more ships in each of 2 different systems that both contain another different player's space dock.

name: Darken the Skies
objective: Win a combat in another player's home system.
objective2: Have ships in 2 different player's home systems.

name: Decimation
objective: Win a space combat in the first round of combat where your opponent did not successfully execute a retreat.
objective2: Have more units of each of 7 types on the game board than 1 player that is your neighbor.

name: Decisive Legislation
objective: Vote for an outcome that receives at least 10 more votes than any other outcome.
objective2: Vote for an outcome that receives at least 20 more votes than any other outcome.

name: Defend Infrastructure
objective: Have 9 infantry on each of 2 planets that contain a structure.
objective2: Have 9 infantry on each of 4 planets that contain a structure.

name: Defy Space and Time
objective: Have units in the wormhole nexus.
objective2: Have at least 8 non-fighter ships in the wormhole nexus.

name: Demonstrate Your Power
objective: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.
objective2: Have 15 non-fighter ships in or adjacent to other player's home systems.

name: Destroy Heretical Works
objective: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.
objective2: Purge 4 of your relic fragments and 1 of your attachments.

name: Destroy Research Vessels
objective: Win a combat against a player with the most technologies.
objective2: Have units in the home system of another player with the most technologies.

name: Destroy their Greatest Ship
objective: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.
objective2: Have more combined ships with a cost of 6 or higher on the game board than the rest of the table combined and have at least 1 scored secret objective.

name: Develop Ultimate Weapon
objective: Own Warsun technology.
objective2: Have a Warsun in each of 2 different systems that are either Mecatol Rex or another player's home system.

name: Dictate Policy
objective: There are 3 or more laws in play.
objective2: There are 6 or more laws in play.

name: Diversify Approaches
objective: Have at least 1 space dock in a system with an industrial planet, at least 2 PDS on cultural planets, and at least 1 mech on a hazardous planet.
objective2: Have at least 2 space docks on industrial planets, at least 4 PDS on cultural planets, and at least 2 mechs on hazardous planets.

name: Diversify Outposts
objective: Control 3 technology specialty planets of different colors.
objective2: Control a technology specialty planets of each of 3 colors and 2 of a 4th color.

name: Dominate Culture
objective: Control a cultural planet adjacent to another player's home system.
objective2: Control a cultural planet in each of 2 systems adjacent to other players' home systems.

name: Drive the Debate
objective: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.
objective2: Own 2 elect player laws.

name: Establish a Perimeter
objective: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.
objective2: Have 6 PDS on the game board and have at least 5 infantry on each of your planets that contain a PDS.

name: Establish Hegemony
objective: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.
objective2: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 24.

name: Expand Reach
objective: Have at least 1 ship in each of 3 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.
objective2: Have at least 1 ship in each of 7 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Field Test Advancements
objective: Win a combat in which 2 of your surviving units are of different unit types whose unit upgrades you own.
objective2: Have a unit whose unit upgrade you own in each of 5 systems not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Fight with Precision
objective: Destroy the last of a player's fighters in the active system during the anti-fighter barrage step.
objective2: Have a unit with ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE in each of 8 systems.

name: Focus Advancements
objective: Control 2 planets with the same technology specialty.
objective2: Control 4 planets with the same technology specialty.

name: Forge an Alliance
objective: Control 4 cultural planets.
objective2: Control 7 cultural planets.

name: Forge Daring Culture
objective: Control 3 hazardous planets and 3 cultural planets.
objective2: Control 5 hazardous planets and 5 cultural planets.

name: Forgive Debts
objective: Return 3 promissory notes from your hand to the hands of their original owners.
objective2: Return 6 promissory notes from your hand to the hands of their original owners.

name: Foster Cohesion
objective: Be neighbors with all other players.
objective2: Reveal from your hand or have in your play area a promissory note from each other player.

name: Fuel Industrial Machine
objective: Control 3 hazardous planets and 3 industrial planets.
objective2: Control 5 hazardous planets and 5 industrial planets.

name: Fuel War Machine
objective: Have 3 space docks on the game board.
objective2: Have 6 non-fighter ships in each of 3 systems that contain your space docks.

name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
objective: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.
objective2: Have 5 dreadnoughts and 8 cruisers on the game board.

name: Hoard Raw Materials
objective: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.
objective2: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 24.

name: Industrialize Culture
objective: Control 3 cultural planets and 3 industrial planets.
objective2: Control 5 cultural planets and 5 industrial planets.

name: Learn the Cosmos' Secrets
objective: Have 1 or more units in 4 systems that are each in or adjacent to an anomaly.
objective2: Have 1 or more units in 8 systems that are each in or adjacent to an anomaly.

name: Lend Aid
objective: Another player used the effect of 1 of your promissory notes.
objective2: Give a combination of 12 trade goods and/or promissory notes from your hand to players that are your neighbor.

name: Make an Example of their World
objective: Destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet during the bombardment step.
objective2: Have a unit with Bombardment in each of 3 systems that contain a planet another player controls with no infantry.

name: Master Archaeology
objective: Own at least 2 relics.
objective2: Own at least 4 relics.

name: Master Biotics
objective: Control a green technology specialty planet, 2 green technologies, and at least 1 unit upgrade technology with at least 1 green prerequisite.
objective2: Control 2 green technology specialty planets, 3 green technologies, and at least 2 unit upgrade technologies with at least 1 green prerequisite.

name: Master Cybernetics
objective: Control a yellow technology specialty planet, 2 yellow technologies, and at least 1 unit upgrade technology with at least 1 yellow prerequisite.
objective2: Control 2 yellow technology specialty planets, 3 yellow technologies, and at least 2 unit upgrade technologies with at least 1 yellow prerequisite.

name: Master Propulsion
objective: Control a blue technology specialty planet, 2 blue technologies, and at least 1 unit upgrade technology with at least 1 blue prerequisite.
objective2: Control 2 blue technology specialty planets, 3 blue technologies, and at least 2 unit upgrade technologies with at least 1 blue prerequisite.

name: Master the Laws of Physics
objective: Own 4 technologies of the same color.
objective2: Own 6 technologies of the same color.

name: Master Warfare
objective: Control a red technology specialty planet, 2 red technologies, and at least 1 unit upgrade technology with at least 1 red prerequisite.
objective2: Control 2 red technology specialty planets, 3 red technologies, and at least 2 unit upgrade technologies with at least 1 red prerequisite.

name: Mechanize the Military
objective: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.
objective2: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets and at least 4 infantry on each of 4 different planets.

name: Mine Rare Minerals
objective: Control 4 hazardous planets.
objective2: Control 7 hazardous planets.

name: Monopolize Production
objective: Control 4 industrial planets.
objective2: Control 7 industrial planets.

name: No Witnesses
objective: Win a space combat in a system that contains no planets.
objective2: Remove 4 of your ground forces from the space area of each of 4 systems that contain no planets.

name: Occupy the Fringe
objective: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.
objective2: Have 9 or more ground forces on 2 planets that do not contain 1 of your space docks.

name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
objective: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.
objective2: Control Mecatol Rex and have 8 or more non-fighter ships in its system.

name: Overpowering Defense
objective: Have at least 7 units on the game board with SUSTAIN DAMAGE.
objective2: Have at least 10 unit with SUSTAIN DAMAGE in systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Overrun Defenses
objective: Win a ground combat on a planet that contained another player's PDS at the start of the combat.
objective2: Have a ship in each of 4 systems that contain other players' PDS.

name: Patrol The Far Reaches
objective: Have 4 Destroyers in each of 2 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.
objective2: Have 4 combined cruisers and/or destroyers in each of 4 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Prioritize Speed
objective: Have 8 cruisers on the game board.
objective2: Have 8 cruisers on the game board that are not in or adjacent to your home system, own your cruiser unit upgrade, and own Gravity Drive.

name: Produce en Masse
objective: Have units with a combined Production value of at least 8 in a single system.
objective2: Have units with a combined Production value of at least 8 in or adjacent to another player's home system.

name: Prove Endurance
objective: Be the last player to pass during a game round.
objective2: Be the last player to pass and spend 3 command tokens from your tactic pool.

name: Punish Heretics
objective: Win a combat against a player with the most relics; minimum 1.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player with the most relics.

name: Punish the Weak
objective: Win a combat against a player with the least victory points.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player with the least points.

name: Rebel Against Political Elites
objective: Win a combat against a player that owns an elect player law.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player that owns an elect player law.

name: Recruit A Large Army
objective: Have 20 infantry on the game board.
objective2: Have 45 infantry on the game board.

name: Seize an Icon
objective: Control a legendary planet.
objective2: Control 2 legendary planets.

name: Settle Spacetime's Edge
objective: Control 3 planets that are each in or adjacent to a system containing a wormhole.
objective2: Control 6 planets that are each in or adjacent to a system containing a wormhole.

name: Settle the Frontier
objective: Control 3 planets that are in or adjacent to an anomaly.
objective2: Control 6 planets that are in or adjacent to an anomaly.

name: Show of Strength
objective: Have at least 1 ship in each of 2 systems that contain a planet another player controls.
objective2: Have at least 1 ship in each of 4 systems that contain a planet another player controls.

name: Show the Council Your Strength
objective: Win a combat in the Mecatol Rex system.
objective2: Have at least 10 ground forces on Mecatol Rex.

name: Spark a Rebellion
objective: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player with the most victory points.

name: Spread Influence
objective: Have 1 or more units in each of at least 8 systems.
objective2: Have 1 or more units in each of at least 13 systems.

name: Stake Your Claim
objective: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.
objective2: Control a planet in each of 2 systems that contain a planet controlled by another player.

name: Study the Symbols
objective: Have a unit in or adjacent to at least 3 systems that contain a legendary planet or Mecatol Rex.
objective2: Have a unit in or adjacent to at least 6 systems that contain a legendary planet or Mecatol Rex.

name: Study Their Defenses
objective: Have ships in each of 2 systems that are in or adjacent to systems that contain other player's PDS.
objective2: Have ships in each of 6 systems that are in or adjacent to systems that contain other player's PDS.

name: Study Their Supply Chain
objective: Have ships in each of 2 systems that are in or adjacent to systems that contain other player's space docks.
objective2: Have ships in each of 6 systems that are in or adjacent to systems that contain other player's space docks.

name: Take Research Facility
objective: Control a planet with a technology specialty adjacent to another player's home system.
objective2: Control 2 planets with technology specialties adjacent to other players' home systems.

name: Take Their Minerals
objective: Win a ground combat on a hazardous planet.
objective2: Control 4 hazardous planets that are not adjacent to your home system.

name: Threaten Enemies
objective: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.
objective2: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in each of 2 systems adjacent to different other player's home systems.

name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
objective: Destroy the last of a player's non-fighter ships in the active system during the space cannon offense step.
objective2: Have more non-fighter ships on the game board than each of 2 players that are your neighbor combined.

name: Undercut Their Industry
objective: Win a ground combat on an industrial planet.
objective2: Control 4 industrial planets that are not adjacent to your home system.

name: Undermine Their Culture
objective: Win a ground combat on a cultural planet.
objective2: Control 4 cultural planets that are not adjacent to your home system.

name: Unflappable Command
objective: Have no command tokens in your reinforcements.
objective2: Have no command tokens in your reinforcements and at least 5 readied planets.

name: Unseat the False King
objective: Take control of Mecatol Rex when it was controlled by another player.
objective2: Control the home system of another player that controls Mecatol Rex.

name: Unveil Flagship
objective: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.
objective2: Have your flagship in another players home system.

name: Usurp Industrial Power
objective: Control an industrial planet adjacent to another player's home system.
objective2: Control an industrial planet in each of 2 systems adjacent to other players' home systems.

name: Weaken the Powerful
objective: Win a combat against a player that controls the most planets.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player that controls the most planets.

name: Fortify Riches
objective: Have a structure on each of 3 planets with at least 3 resources.
objective2: Have a structure on each of 3 planets with at least 3 resources not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Take Influential Strongholds
objective: Have a structure on each of 3 planets with at least 3 influence.
objective2: Have a structure on each of 3 planets with at least 3 influence not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Master Negotiation
objective: Have at least 10 promissory notes in your hand.
objective2: Have at least 15 promissory notes in your hand.

name: Heavy Artillery
objective: Have a 12 units on the game board with any combination of BOMBARDMENT, SPACE CANNON, or ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE.
objective2: Have a 12 units on the game board with any combination of BOMBARDMENT, SPACE CANNON, or ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Diversify Holdings
objective: Control 2 cultural, industrial, and hazardous planets.
objective2: Control 4 cultural, industrial, and hazardous planets.

name: Strategic Encroachment
objective: Control a planet adjacent to another player's home system that has an attachment.
objective2: Control 2 planets with attachments adjacent to other players' home systems.

name: Technological Exhaustion
objective: Exhaust 3 of your technologies that have an exhaust ability.
objective2: Exhaust 5 of your technologies that have an exhaust ability.

name: Attain Resource Supremacy
objective: Control 4 planets outside your home system with more resources than influence.
objective2: Control 6 planets outside your home system with more resources than influence.

name: Achieve Supreme Influence
objective: Control 4 planets outside your home system with more influence than resources.
objective2: Control 6 planets outside your home system with more influence than resources.

name: Tactical Fatigue
objective: Have at least 5 exhausted non-planet, non-strategy cards in your play area.
objective2: Have at least 7 exhausted non-planet, non-strategy cards in your play area.

name: Selective Arsenal
objective: Have none of 2 different unit types in your reinforcements for which at least 1 of your neighbors owns the unit upgrade technology.
objective2: Have none of 4 different unit types in your reinforcements for which at least 1 of your neighbors owns the unit upgrade technology.

name: Tactical Command
objective: Have a command token in each of 3 systems adjacent to other player's planets and that contains 1 of your ships.
objective2: Have a command token in each of 6 systems adjacent to other player's planets and that contains 1 of your ships.

name: Execute Traitor
objective: Purge a leader from your play area.
objective2: Purge your agent and commander. You cannot score this objective if you have already scored another secret objective.

name: Master Their Culture
objective: Meet the conditions to unlock another player's commander and have your commander unlocked.
objective2: Meet the conditions to unlock another player's commander while you control their home system.

name: Generous Diplomat
objective: Give 2 promissory notes to a neighbor and 1 promissory note to a different neighbor.
objective2: Give 2 promissory notes to a player whose home system you control and 1 promissory note to a different player to whose home system you have a ship in or adjacent.

name: Suffer Slings and Arrows
objective: Have 3 damaged units at the end of a combat you won.
objective2: Have 8 damaged non-cruiser units on the game board.

name: Dock Assault
objective: Win a combat in a system that contained a space dock at the start of the combat.
objective2: Have a space dock in a system that contains another player's space dock.

name: Prove Eagerness
objective: Be the first to pass.
objective2: Have more of your command tokens on your command sheet than 2 players that are your neighbor combined.

name: Target Powerful Ships
objective: Destroy 2 of your opponents units with SUSTAIN DAMAGE in the same round of combat.
objective2: Have more non-cruiser units with SUSTAIN DAMAGE on the game than 2 players that are your neighbor combined.

name: Structure Dominance
objective: Win a combat against a player that has the most structures on the board than any other player.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player that has more structures on the game board than any other player.

name: Toppling the Leader
objective: Win a combat against a player with the highest initiative in a home system, system that contains Mecatol Rex, or a system that contains a legendary planet.
objective2: Control the a planet in the home system of another player that has the highest initative.

name: Hamper Bureaucracy
objective: There are at least 7 agendas in the discard pile.
objective2: There are at least 11 agendas in the discard pile.

name: Diversify Fleets
objective: Have 5 different types of non-fighter ships in a system.
objective2: Have at least 4 different types of non-fighter ships in each of 3 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Develop Weaponry
objective: Own unit upgrade technologies with combined prerequisites that include each color.
objective2: Own unit upgrade technologies whose combined prerequisites have at least 2 of each color.

name: Contain Their Culture
objective: Gain control of another player's highest influence planet.
objective2: Control other player's home system planets with a combine influence value of at least 3.

name: Cripple Their Economy
objective: Gain control of another player's highest resource planet.
objective2: Control other player's home system planets with a combine resource value of at least 3.

name: Check and Balance
objective: Win a combat against the speaker.
objective2: Control a planet in the home system of another player with the speaker token.

name: Surprise Your Enemies
objective: Win a combat against a player who has passed.
objective2: Purge 2 other secret objectives from your hand.

name: Peacefully Transition Power
objective: Gain control of another player's planet that did not contain any units at the start of this action.
objective2: Choose 4 planets you control that contain no units. Choose a player to gain control of each planet.

name: Spare No Munitions
objective: After your opponent assigns hits, have 3 hits left unassigned.
objective2: Have 8 non-fighter ships in other players' home systems.

name: Domineer
objective: Have ships in 4 systems that contain a PDS.
objective2: Have ships in 8 systems that contain a PDS.

name: Learn from Others
objective: Fulfill the requirements to score 2 secret objectives other players have scored.
objective2: Fulfill the requirements to score 4 secret objectives other players have scored.

name: Support the Weak
objective: Have 1 of your promissory notes in the play area of a player with the least victory points.
objective2: Have 1 of your promissory notes in the play area of a player with the least victory points and control a planet in that player's home system.

name: Build a Wonder
objective: Have 3 structures in a non-home system.
objective2: Have 5 structures in a non-home system.

name: Galvanize the People
objective: Exhaust 1 planet of each trait.
objective2: Exhaust 2 planets of each trait.

name: Leverage Soft Power
objective: Have 2 or less promissory notes in your hand.
objective2: Have no promissory notes in your hand.

name: Form the Heart of a New Empire
objective: Control a planet in a system that is adjacent to 6 systems that contain your units.
objective2: Control a planet in each of 2 systems that are each adjacent to 6 systems that contain your units.

name: Form a Contact Network
objective: Control 5 planets outside of your home system that each have an influence value of 2 or higher.
objective2: Control 9 planets outside of your home system that each have an influence value of 2 or higher.

name: Gather Abundance
objective: Control 5 planets outside of your home system that each have a resource value of 2 or higher.
objective2: Control 9 planets outside of your home system that each have a resource value of 2 or higher.

name: Dominate Cities
objective: Have non-fighter ships in 5 systems that contain a structure.
objective2: Have non-fighter ships in 9 systems that contain a structure.

name: Connect The Cosmos
objective: Have a unit in each of 2 different systems that contain a wormhole of the same type.
objective2: Have a unit in each system that contains a wormhole of the same type.

name: Make Backroom Deals
objective: Make a binding deal with another player in which they cast at least 10 votes for an agreed upon outcome.
objective2: Have a promissory note in your player area of a player that owns at least 2 elect player laws.
